###Simulating the Independent Shooter

```{r}
outcomes= c('H', 'M')

sim_basket = sample(outcomes, size=133,replace=T,
                    prob=c(0.45,0.55))
table(sim_basket)
table(kobe$basket)
barplot(table(calc_streak(sim_basket)))
barplot(table(kobe_streak))
```
